column1: 1/This animal has a long neck and is known for eating leaves from tall trees./Giraffe/10
2/This animal is a large marine mammal known for its intelligence and social behavior./Dolphin/20
3/This bird is known for its bright colors and ability to mimic human speech./Parrot/10
4/This animal has a pouch and is native to Australia
column2: known for hopping on its hind legs./Kangaroo/30

column1: 5/This animal is known for its black and white stripes and is found in Africa./Zebra/20
6/This reptile is known for its ability to change color to blend in with its surroundings./Chameleon/10
7/This animal is known for building dams in rivers and has webbed feet./Beaver/20
8/This flightless bird is known for its large size and inability to fly./Ostrich/30
9/This nocturnal animal is known for its distinctive call and is often associated with wisdom./Owl/30
10/This large mammal has tusks and is known for its intelligence and strong social bonds./Elephant/10
